name: CR RM Consumption (Supplier)
query:
SELECT
`tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date as "Date:Date/Date:80",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.name as "ID:Link/Purchase Receipt:110",
`tabItem`.item_name as "RM Consumed:Data:200",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item Supplied`.consumed_qty as "Qty consumed:Float:85",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.item_code as "Item Received:Data:120",
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`.qty as "Qty Received:Float:90",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.supplier as "Supplier:Data:180",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.supplier_invoice_no as "Supplier Invoice No:Data:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.supplier_invoice_date as "Supplier Invoice Date:Data:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.stock_entry_no as "Stock Entry No:Data:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.stock_entry_date as "Stock Entry Date:Date:100",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.additional_discount_percentage as "Percent Discount:Data:50",
`tabPurchase Receipt`.discount_amount as "Additional Discount:Data:100"

FROM
`tabPurchase Receipt Item`,
`tabPurchase Receipt`,
`tabPurchase Receipt Item Supplied`,
`tabItem`

WHERE
`tabPurchase Receipt`.docstatus=1 
&& `tabPurchase Receipt Item`.parent=`tabPurchase Receipt`.name
&& `tabPurchase Receipt Item Supplied`.parent=`tabPurchase Receipt`.name
&& `tabPurchase Receipt Item Supplied`.rm_item_code=`tabItem`.name
&& `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date <= 
   %(to_date)s
&& `tabItem`.item_group=%(item_group)s

ORDER BY `tabPurchase Receipt`.posting_date
